dataObjects.subject: http://www.eol.org/voc/table_of_contents#Wikipedia
dataObjects.title: Hoplosternum punctatum
dataObjects.bibliographicCitation: "Hoplosternum punctatum." Wikipedia, The Free Encyclopedia. 23 Feb 2014, 06:28 UTC. 2 Feb 2015 <http://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Hoplosternum_punctatum&oldid=645290325>.
dataObjects.description:
Hoplosternum punctatum is a species of catfish of the family Callichthyidae. This species is only found in the Atrato River basin in Colombia and in the Pacific coastal drainages of Panama, in southern Central America.[1]

References[edit]

  • Froese, Rainer and Pauly, Daniel, eds. (2011). "Hoplosternum punctatum" in FishBase. December 2011 version.
  1. ^ Reis, Roberto E. (1998-05-14). "Hoplosternum Gill 1858". Tree of Life Web Project. Retrieved 2007-07-04.
